title: Norwich: a cathedral city
creator_credit: Nigel Rea, EFVA and Boulton-Hawker Films
brief_description: The film shows the development of Norwich as a nodal point for the whole of Norfolk. The modern city is shown to have a variety of industries, including the manufacture of footwear and food products, together with engineering and printing.
description: The film shows the development of Norwich as a nodal point for the whole of Norfolk. The modern city is shown to have a variety of industries, including the manufacture of footwear and food products, together with engineering and printing.
